front.title: IEEE Standard for AC High-Voltage Circuit Breakers Rated on a Symmetrical Current Basis

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.keyword: C37.06-2009, capacitance switching, dielectric withstand voltage, endurance, gas-insulated substations, high-voltage circuit breakers, interrupting capability, TRV
front.abstract: The preferred ratings of indoor and outdoor high-voltage circuit breakers rated above 1000 V for use in commercial, industrial, and utility installations are described.
